## Carry Recipe
_Reverse Coolest Hip Cross Carry – Base Size Minus 2 – 2 Cross Passes_

- Short tail to hip over shoulder and diagonal across back
- Other tail comes across belly, around back, under arm and up through torso pass
- Tie slip knot at shoulder
- Place baby in the X at your hip, spreading inner first, then outer cross
- Tighten as necessary
